examples: Mr. Ruskin, in a famous libel case, said that a man had no right to throw a paintpot at a canvas and call it a picture.

entries.meaning: (dated, television) A lever on a telecine machine that controls the range of colors in an image.
examples: […]  vertical joystick or 'paintpot' may be used, that will pivot hemispherically to any degree within a color circle.
